ITEM DESCRIPTION: ALPHA-MHT-1000VK dual Vickers/Knoop microhardness tester with auto turret instrument for Vickers and Knoop indenters independently to changing out the indenters. Benefits include variable testing forces (10, 25, 50, 100, 200, 300, 500, 1000 gram load), 10X, 20 and 40X objectives, automatic loading, dwell and unloading along with an auto-turret head to prevent damage to the indenter (cat. no. ALPHA -MHT-1000VK)

ALPHA MHT-1000Z auto turret Micro Vickers hardness testing instrument for Vickers and Knoop indenters.  Benefits include variable testing forces (10, 25, 50, 100, 200, 300, 500, 1000 gram load), 10X and 40X objectives, automatic loading, dwell and unloading along with an auto-turret head to prevent damage to the indenter.  The ALPHA MHT-1000Z can save and export data to either a printer or a PC via a RS232 interface cable. (cat. no. ALPHA-MHT-1000Z)

ALPHA-MHT-2000Z2 auto turret precision Micro Vickers hardness testing instrument for Vickers and Knoop indenters.  Features include an auto turret head, large LCD screen for displaying measuring methods, testing force, indentation length, hardness value, dwell time and the number of measurements.   (part no. ALPHA-MHT-2000Z2)
ATTO-1000S controlled micro-precision polisher for plano-parallel sample preparation (Cat. No. ATTO-1000S)

FEMTO 1100S automatic polishing head for use with the NANO 1000T or NANO 2000S polishing machine. The FEMTO 1100S is a variable speed (0-200 rpm), pneumatically adjustable individual piston polishing head for polishing 1 to 6 specimens independent of each other (note with independent pistons, initial grinding can be done with finer abrasives thus reducing the number of grinding steps). Other benefits include easy to use controls, quick-locking swing mounted design, communication capability with the NANO 1000S and NANO 2000S polishing bases. Mounts onto stainless steel mounting column. The FEMTO 1100S automated polishing head has a built-in transformer so it can be operated at either 110V or 220V.

FEMTO 1500S is a dual individual and central automatic polishing head (Part No. FEMTO-1500S) for use with the NANO- 1000S or NANO-2000S polishing machines. The FEMTO 1500S is a variable speed (0-200 rpm), pneumatically adjustable polishing head for polishing 1 to 6 specimens independent of each other, or 3-6 specimens using a fixed central force polishing holder for superior flatness. The FEMTO 1500S automated polishing head has a built-in transformer so it can be operated at either 110V or 220V.

FEMTO 2200 automatic polishing head for use with the NANO 1200T polishing machine. The FEMTO 2200 is a variable speed (0-200 rpm), pneumatically adjustable individual piston polishing head for polishing 1 to 6 specimens independent of each other (note with independent pistons, initial grinding can be done with finer abrasives thus reducing the number of grinding steps). Other benefits include easy to use controls, quick-locking swing mounted design, communication capability with the NANO 1200T polishing base. Mounts onto stainless steel mounting column. The FEMTO 2200 automated polishing head has a built-in transformer so it can be operated at either 110V or 220V.

FEMTO 2500 is a dual individual and central automatic polishing head (Part No. FEMTO-2500) for use with the NANO- 1200T polishing machine. The FEMTO 2500 is a variable speed (0-200 rpm), pneumatically adjustable polishing head for polishing 1 to 6 specimens independent of each other, or 3-6 specimens using a fixed central force polishing holder for superior flatness. The FEMTO 2500 automated polishing head has a built-in transformer so it can be operated at either 110V or 220V.

GIGA-S vibratory polisher is a 9 or 12-inch metallurgical vibratory polisher (bowls quoted separately).  The GIGA-S is designed to prepare even the most difficult to polish materials with a very gentle polishing action.  Polishing is accomplished by setting the default frequency so that the sample begins to vibrate and then changing the voltage in order to adjust the rotational speed.  The GIGA-S features interchangeable polishing bowls, one machine utilizes both 9-inch and 12-inch bowl sizes, used an advanced PZT motor for better vibration control, SMC cover with clear acrylic hood, and heavy duty aluminum casting base.  Numerous specimen holders and weight are also available (quoted separately), The GIGA-S vibratory polisher has a built-in transformer so it can be operated at either 110V or 220V (part no. GIGA-S)

IM-3000B inverted metallurgical microscope with Brightfield illumination.  Includes: 10X extra wide eyepiece, 4X, 10X, 20X, 50X and 100X infinite plan achromatic objectives, trinocular head, mechanical stage and color filters (grey, blue, green, ground glass) (part no. IM-3000B)

IM-5000 inverted metallurgical microscope features bright-field, dark field, polarized light and differential interference contrast (DIC) illumination, binocular eyepiece tubes and a digital camera port.  The IM-5000 inverted microscope is an excellent choice for a multipurpose economical  metallurgical microscope.  Objectives include 5X, 10X, 20X, 50X and 100X with wide field 10X eyepieces (part no. IM-5000)

Microhardness Pro 4.2 is an easy to use image analysis software for measuring microhardness and for generating easy to distribute Excel reports. It is a single screen Windows based system. 
The Microhardness Pro 4.2 software can handle both gray monochrome (8 bit) and color (24 bit) images. Multiple images of any size can be opened and displayed on the screen for analysis or comparison. The software supports the most common formats like BMP, JPEG, TIFF, PNG, GIF and PSD. Live images also can be observed and captured on the same platform. Since the system is in a Windows environment, graphs and charts displayed on the monitor can be quickly transferred into other Windows based programs such as, MS Word, MS Excel or any other commercial Windows based software for the purpose producing reports and presentations.

NANO-1000S single wheel grinder polisher bench top polisher for 8 and/or 10-inch wheels.   Features variable speed (100-1000 rpm with 1 rpm increments), input voltage 110V/220V single phase converted to 3-phase for higher torque (1 hp) motor, preset fast speed buttons (100, 200, 300 rpm), auto mode (programmable speed, direction and time), tough and rugged GRP (glass reinforced plastic) construction, water inlet and outlet for wheel lubrication.  Includes splash guard and cover.  Working wheels and paper backed paper ring are quoted separately.  Optional FEMTO-1100S polishing heads can be ordered with the system or for later installation.  The NANO-1000S can be operated at either 110V or 220V (requires wirnig change on the motor)  (part no. NANO-1000S).

NANO-1200T single wheel grinder polisher bench top polisher for 12 and/or 14-inch wheels.   Features variable speed (100-1000 rpm with 1 rpm increments), input voltage 110V/220V single phase converted to 3-phase for higher torque (1.5 hp) motor, preset fast speed buttons (100, 200, 300 rpm), auto mode (programmable speed, direction and time), tough and rugged GRP (glass reinforced plastic) construction, water inlet and outlet for wheel lubrication.  Includes splash guard and cover.  Working wheels and paper backed paper ring are quoted separately.  The NANO 1200T polisher can be operated at 110V or 220V (requires wiring change on the motor) (part no. NANO-1200T).

NANO-2000S double wheel grinder polisher bench top polisher for 8 and/or 10-inch wheels.   Features variable speed (100-1000 rpm with 1 rpm increments), input voltage 110V/220V single phase converted to 3-phase for higher torque (1 hp) motor, preset fast speed buttons (100, 200, 300 rpm), auto mode (programmable speed, direction and time), tough and rugged GRP (glass reinforced plastic) construction, water inlet and outlet for wheel lubrication.  Includes splash guard and cover.  Working wheels and paper backed paper ring are quoted separately.  Optional FEMTO-1100S polishing heads can be ordered with the system or for later installation.  The NANO 2000T polisher can be operated at 110V or 220V (requires wirnig change on the motor)  (part no. NANO-2000S).

PENTA-5000 5-station hand grinder offers the small lab the ability to prepare samples for macro viewing within minutes.    This hand grinder offers 5 stations for coarse to fine grinding.  With the addition of the 5th station a near polished specimen can be obtained using a 1200 (P4000) grit SiC paper.  The PENTA-5000 has an easy to advance system for providing fresh abrasive for consistent and rapid grinding.  The PENTA-5000 also has an adjustable flow valve for wet grinding.  The PENTA-5000 is a stationary grinder using 3-7/16-inches x 60-feet rolls set up for 240, 360,  600, 800 and 1200 grit abrasive (part no. PENTA-5000)

PENTA-7500S wet or dry belt grinder for coarse grinding.  The PENTA-7500 also exclusively features a square grinding attachment to hold the specimen mounts perpendicular during grinding (holders for fixture sold separately) (part no. PENTA-7500).

The VM-100 digital stereo microscope (Part No. VM-100) has 0.7X ~ 4.5X electronic magnification with a zoom ratio of 6.5:1. With a built-in SD memory card, high resolution photo and video recordings are easy to obtain (includes monitor).

The VM-100 digital stereo microscope is ideal for  low magnification documentation of metallographic specimens prior to polishing and grinding. It is also very useful for measuring cracks, weld penetration depth and other topographical features.

The VM-500PLUS digital stereo microscope with autofocus and built-in measurement capabilities (Part No. VM-500) has 0.7X ~ 4.5X electronic magnification with a zoom ratio of 6.5:1. With a built-in SD memory card, high resolution photo and video recordings are easy to obtain (includes monitor).

The VM-500PLUS digital stereo microscope is ideal for  low magnification documentation of metallographic specimens prior to polishing and grinding. It is also very useful for measuring cracks, weld penetration depth and other topographical features.

Weld Check software is a powerful, easy-to-use tool that enhances the ability to quickly and efficiently measure critical welding features such as fillet welds, throat, leg lengths and penetration.
Fillet weld example: a fillet weld of approximately triangular cross section joining two surfaces at approximately right angles to each other can be measured for the following important measurements:
- Distance from the foot of the fillet to the center of the face (or throat)
-Distance from the root of the joint to the junction between the exposed surface of the weld and the base metal (leg)
-Angles and the root penetration
-Depth of HAZ (heat affected zone)
-Area of HAZ
-Joint penetration
-Phase counting, etc.
Weld Check is a Microsoft Windows based product so reports are easily generated in MS Excel.

ZETA 2000 4-fluid automated / manual dispenser used for controlling and regulating the application of abrasives such as diamond, alumina, collodial silica and lubricant solutions onto the polishing surface.  Features microprocessor controlled, 7-inch touchscreen interface, digital LED readout 4-independent peristaltic pumps, interfaces with the FEMTO-S autopolishing heads for automated abrasive fluid dispensing, capable of dispensing NANOMETER alumina and SIAMAT colloidal silica   (part no. ZETA-2000S)

ZMS0745T trinocular stereo microscope has an optical design for enhancing reproduction and true color imaging of the specimen.  The ZMS0745T stereo microscope has a magnification range of 7X to approximately 45X and is ideal for low magnification documentation of the metallographic specimen prior to polishing and grinding.  It is also very useful for measuring cracks, weld penetration depth and other topographical features (cat. no. 411-131).
